title: Coolish sounding idea for Yasuo that probably won't work but...

replies.body: Maybe in URF mode where Yasuo is trash.

Then we'd have people complaining about how their own ult killed them. 

That's even funnier, have an upvote!

Yeah, good plan.  Cause people don't hate him ENOUGH.

If anything windwall needs to go the hell away and be put on a support like it belongs.

as nice as it sounds, it was easier for them to just be negated or blocked than deflected.

Currently there isn't any mechanic in the game that allows deflection of skills or abilities.
but what if yasuo windwalls another yasuo's 3rd q that then gets windwalled by the other yasuo? infinite tornado?
If it reflected them but the reflected projectiles could still hurt enemies then that would be cool
